lcnx.title: Newbie Expressions Part 1
lcnx.dscrip:
The unit on Newbie Expressions is designed to teach you a sub-set
of Spanish that you can use to excuse yourself and ask for certain
considerations on account of not knowing more Spanish than that.
It is important to start with that because you can't wait until
you're fluent in Spanish to start your immersion.

lcnx.title: Core Course - Lesson 1
lcnx.dscrip:
The Core Course is a tour through the language focused on the
most commonly-used words first. It is not, however, a so-called
"core vocabulary" approach to the language. Yes, it uses
data collected for the purpose of that approach in it's
formulation - but merely as a guide. It treats every part of
the language, however, with more sensitivity than a 'core
vocabulary' approach does.

Remember that the LanguaMunity program is not a full course
in any language - but is intended as a tool to be used in
conjunction with immersion.
